title: T206 Tinker missing ink LAST PRICE DROP
author: Bpm0014

posts.post_title: T206 Tinker missing ink LAST PRICE DROP
posts.post_content: Other than a true scrap, it’s not often that a Hall of Fame T206 can be found missing ink. Well here is one. Guaranteed 100% authentic and 100% missing ink (and not caused by back damage), there are less than 5 of these known.  No back damage.  For sale at $1100 OBO
